message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something truly unique.
I'm really interested in the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $60.

I understand that $180 might be a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you a price of $120. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's a great deal considering the value this product brings.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $90.

I understand that you're still looking for a better deal, but I'm getting close to my minimum price. I can offer you a price of $110. This is the best I can do, and I think it's a great compromise considering the value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $95.

I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing too much profit. I can offer you a price of $105. This is as low as I'm willing to go, and I think it's still a great deal for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $98.

I'm starting to get concerned that we're getting too far apart. I can offer you a price of $102. This is my final concession, and I'm not willing to go any lower. I think it's a fair price considering the value of the product.
I appreciate your final concession, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $95. If we can meet at this price, I'm willing to make a deal.
